channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping, 10th January
item.description:
Fly tipping and abandoned rubbish near Grasshaven way bus stop Y

item.title: Pipe work is leaking, 10th January
item.description:
The pipe is leaking where it comes out of the wall. Tap is all turned off. Picture shows it dripping down the wall from the metal. Relatively fast water is coming, like a tap turned all the way on.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Portland Rise, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rochester Way, Eltham

item.title: Cracking and Bitumen filling problems, 10th January
item.description:
From nNo 26 to the road entrance to the carehome . Cracking issues of concrete Bitumen filling poor here. Needs the bitumen relaid properly between the concrete section of the surfacng. Age , or poor workmanship or poor quality bitumen used. Contractrs work needs assessing by Council techical person. Not a good use of council tax payers money.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Harland Avenue, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Penshurst Avenue, Blackfen, Greater London

item.title: Advertising poster on sign post. Danger of distraction to drivers., 10th January

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lynwood Grove, Crofton, Greater London

item.title: Harland Ave intersection with Brooklands Avenue ( Ulez Camera ), 10th January
item.description:
Another harland insection with Brooklands which has traffic from vehicles and parents/ children going and comming back.from the Primary School. . Surfacing in general poor condtion with the common faults associated with the age/ quality etc . Poor bitumen levels in places..resulting in poor drainage just where there is foot traffic crossing both sections of Harland Ave. Old , tired and dangerous. Especially as it tight turning into both Little birches and Brooklands Ave. Traffic speed down & up Harland avenue in this aprt as relatively straight so see cars easily ,,,but for the foot traffic not helpful .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Harland Avenue, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: An overhead glass panel has been smashed with, a hole left in it. There is lots of glass on the floor and, there is still a large amount of glass still overhead, leaning down, ready to fall on to pedestrians at any moment., 10th January
item.description:
The above summarised damage and, immediate threat to public safety is to overhead glass panelling above a bus stop outside of Boots, widmore road, Bromley
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Widmore Road, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Damage - smashed glass or panels / jagged metal edges on shelter

item.title: Illegal footway obstruction, 10th January
item.description:
Latin Hits at 14 Stoke Newington Rd, London N16 7XN keeps putting out extra tables and chairs on the footway, beyond their permitted area, which are hazardous to pedestrians, particularly when the venue gets busy and the tables and chairs get moved around.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stoke Newington Road, London

item.title: Bitumen filling beyween concrete sufacing sections, 10th January
item.description:
From No 110 No30 ( almost to Intersection with Harlland Avenue Brooklands Ave ( sidcup station end ). Issue with bitunen repalcement filling between concrete sections of road. Most bitumen has come out...poor quality or poor quality workmanship. Question whether Bexley Council ever monitor contractors work. Costly having to redo the bitumining. as it a known problem .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 108, Harland Avenue, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
